pred: Oscar and Payne will meet for a coffee in 15 minutes. Oscar wants to make it half an hour.
answers: Payne and Oscar will have a coffee at Tristano's in half an hour.

pred: Steffen can't go to the infinity pool because he twisted his ankle. Irene offers to give him a lift, but the car can't make it all the way up. Dan suggests that Mr. Budd's car could make it, but Luke doubts it. Luke asks if it's Vistas de Olas.
answers: Steffen twisted his ankle yesterday and needs a lift to the infinity pool. Irene's car probably won't make it up the hill, so they'd have to park at the bottom and hike up. Mr.Budd should make it up the hill since it's a 4-wheel drive.

pred: Rob is having a few people over to watch the game. Bob is doing some errands and cooking food. Jim is planning to celebrate his birthday this weekend. Bob might join him and some friends at a bar.
answers: Rob and Bob are watching the game. Bob will run some errands on the weekend. Jim's birthday is next Wednesday. He might organize a meetup this weekend. Bob will see Rob on the weekend.

pred: Carol has too much fruit from her garden and offers some to Jacob. Jacob wants to make some preserves but Carol doesn't have the time for that. Jacob asks when he can pick up the fruit. Carol offers Wednesday at 6pm.
answers: Carol will collect the excess fruit on Wednesday at 6 pm.

pred: Jamie, Alex, Marlo and Jimmy are going to do their presentations in groups. They are divided into two groups. Alex gives the right to choose the subject to the girls. The girls will choose first.
answers: Jamie, Marlo, Jimmy and Alex's teacher requires their class to divide into 2 groups, each making a presentation. The teacher sent them the presentation subjects via e-mail. Jamie, Marlo, Jimmy and Alex consider dividing the class into groups by gender.

pred: Dan split the cost of the BBQ equally among everyone. Sara didn't eat, so she removed herself. Vicky enjoyed the food.
answers: Dan cooked a successful BBQ meal and will split the bill via Splitwise. He invites everyone who did not eat to remove themselves.

pred: Jesse broke his razor and wants to borrow Stig's.
answers: Jesse broke his razor and wants to borrow Stig's.

pred: Mico wants to go to the village party to meet some boys. Jeff will also go. Mico asks Lia if she wants to join, but she declines. Mico asks Jeff if he wants to drive, and he agrees.
answers: Mico and Jeff will go to the village party. Jeff will drive.

pred: Ken is angry because he thinks Greg owes him money. However, it turns out that Ken was just playing a prank on Greg.
answers: Ken is trying to play a prank on Greg.

pred: Hannah has made a list of New Year's resolutions. Brooklyn has decided not to make any resolutions.
answers: Hannah's New Year's resolutions are: work out, cook for herself, start dating. Brooklyn didn't make any. In the past she had, but she never fulfilled them.

pred: Catherine wants to visit her uncle Steve. Ben doesn't want to go because he doesn't like visiting family. He thinks it will end badly and he will be annoyed by his uncle's questions about his private life. Catherine mentions that the boys miss Ben. Ben agrees to visit them at a later time.
answers: Ben won't go with Catherine to visit uncle Steve. He will visit her and the boys.

pred: Pegah is working late tonight. She will be back at 22:00. Miriam invited some people over, but Pegah can't come because of work.
answers: Pegah is in class till 15:00. She will work from 17:00 till around 21:30. She will be back at 22:00. Miriam invited people over and wants Pegah to come. Pegah will have a cup of tea with her when she gets back. Miriam will save Pegah some wine.

pred: Lauren will work tomorrow. Pam will call her in the morning to confirm. Lauren had a good holiday.
answers: Pam doesn't have rota for Lauren, but Manager may give Lauren more tomorrow. Pam and Lauren will meet tomorrow and discuss Lauren's holiday.

pred: Dory's friend is coming over for a week. Jason and Lucy are working on a video. They have 2 weeks left.
answers: Jason wants to meet Dory over the weekend. Dory's friend is going to stay with her for a week. Jason has been working on a movie with Lucy for the past two months. Jason bought a video-creator app.

pred: Casey did her own nails and they look nice. Amelia and Kristen want Casey to do their nails too.
answers: Casey got a new nail polish and did her nails herself. It took her nearly 4 hours, so she won't do her friends' nails, as it takes too long.

pred: Amy remembers Ralph, a friend of Everett, who asked for her number. Amy agrees to give him her number.
answers: Amy gives Everett permission to give her number to Ralph.

pred: Alejandro and Luz are meeting for the first time in 2 weeks. They have been talking for 3 months. Alejandro feels a strange connection with Luz. Luz is excited to meet him. They will meet on the 20th of December at 4 PM. Luz's mother didn't handle the news well.
answers: Alejandro and Luz are going to meet in 2 weeks for the first time. Luz knows Alejandro very well already. They talk about everything. Luz will be there on the 20th of December at 4PM. Alejandro will pick her up.

pred: David wants a new tattoo on his back. He was thinking of a scull and rose but Mike thinks it's too common.
answers: David wants to get a new tattoo but he doesn't know what exactly yet.

pred: Russel found a perfect present for his mum. They will buy it.
answers: Diana and Russel are buying a present for mum.

pred: Jenkin and Sophie are discussing their spirit animals. Jenkin is a dolphin and Sophie is a fox.
answers: Jenkin has been reading about spirit animals and he was drawn to a dolphin. Sophie would choose a fox. Jenkin will bring pack of cards with spirit animals to Sophie tomorrow.

pred: David babysat Ethan's sister. She was naughty. Avery got a text from Ethan asking her to thank David.
answers: David was looking after Ethan's sister. Ethan is grateful. David won't do it again.

pred: Paul came home and forgot about his physiotherapy appointment. He will schedule a new one. Emma will be home late and Paul will prepare some food for her.
answers: Paul forgot about his physiotherapy and he will schedule a new appointment. Emma will be home after midnight, so Paul will prepare some food for her.

pred: 4 friends are going to see "Aquaman" on Thursday at 8:10 PM. Laura will pay Oona back for the tickets.
answers: Laura, Kelsey, Oona and Sid are going to see "Aquaman" on Thursday at 8:10 pm. Oona will get the tickets.

pred: Conrad is outside the house. He forgot his keys. Tiffany will be home between 10 and 11. Rebecca will be back later. Conrad will wait in a coffee shop.
answers: Conrad can't enter the house because he forgot his keys. Since Rebecca and Tiffany are coming back late, he'll wait in the coffee shop.

pred: 2 people will not be able to attend the meeting.
answers: The individual meeting with Andrew Simmons takes place tomorrow in room 104. Samuel Anderson and Katherine Jackson won't attend it because he has an appointment and she has a retake.

pred: Peter asked Joy for the link of her beauty shop. Joy provided the link.
answers: Joy sent Peter the link to her beauty shop.

pred: Maxwell thanks Jeanice for her work. He's grateful for her. There was a problem with Marcus at school. Marcus was aggressive. Jeanice noticed that he gets angry for stupid reasons. Maxwell wants to talk to Jeanice about Marcus's behavior.
answers: Maxwell pays Jeanice for 8 hours of babysitting and is grateful he found her. His son argued with a friend at school, and got agressive when the teacher reacted. Jeanice hasn't noticed if he has acted strangely recently. Maxwell and Jeanice can grab a coffe some time to discuss all the issues.

pred: Kirsten and Alex are going bowling on Friday at 7 pm.
answers: Kirsten reminds Alex that the youth group meets this Friday at 7 pm and go bowling.

pred: Mia and Steven will meet at 8pm for dinner before the movie, which starts at 9pm. They will have Chinese food.
answers: Mia and Steven want to grab some Chinese at 8.

pred: Benjamin was unable to attend the basketball game on Friday night. The team won 101-98. Benjamin will attend the next game.
answers: Benjamin didn't come to see a basketball game on Friday's night. The team supported by Alex won 101-98. Benjamin's mom has a flu and he's looking after her. Benjamin declares to attend the next basketball match.

pred: Luke and Martial are injured but they are willing to play in the upcoming fixtures. They will let Jose know that they are ready to play despite their injuries. They will meet up at Carrington and go to the coach's office early in the morning.
answers: luke and martial want to help the team and play despite their injuries. They will meet at carrington and go to the coach's office.

pred: Mika offers Linda some perennial plants for her garden. Linda declines because she won't be able to plant them before leaving.
answers: Linda refuses to accept plants for her garden from Mika. She would not be able to plant them before leaving.

pred: Joy and Sandy will meet on Friday evening. Sandy will be late because she needs to take a shower. They both think the dresses are too revealing.
answers: Sandy will go for a run. She will meet Joy after 11am. Lina and Joy don't think the dresses are appropriate. Joy will wait for Sandy.

pred: George wants to meet Donna to discuss a delicate matter.
answers: Donna will pay George a visit tonight to discuss a personal matter.

pred: Samuel is from India and speaks Telugu. He is 35 years old and Tim is 55. Samuel is younger than Tim.
answers: Samuel's language is Telugu, which is spoken in south east India. It has nearly 90 million speakers; it's written left to right; it's based on Brahmin script. Teluguland has 23 provinces. It's quite poor. "Anna" means "elder brother" and Thammu or Thammadu - "younger brother". Tim's 55, Samuel's 35.

pred: Ken is feeling overwhelmed, frustrated, and stressed out.
answers: Ken is having some bad days.

pred: Jane and Steven are going to meet at 4:30 instead of 5. Jane will wait at the main entrance.
answers: Jane wants to leave at 4.30 instead of 5 because Google Maps suggests the 300 km drive should take them at least 3 hours and she doesn't want to be late. She will wait for Steven at the main entrance.

pred: Abigail and Damien are going to church on Sunday. Damien needs to wear a coat and tie.
answers: Abigail and Damien are going to church on Sunday. Damien has to put on a coat and tie.

pred: Laura is planning to visit her parents soon. Her mother has bought a birthday gift for her. Laura misses her father's lasagne.
answers: Laura is going to visit her parents next Saturday. Keith might make a lasagne for her. Laura's mom has a birthday gift for her.

pred: Ed thinks sex is only for married people and should only be done in the missionary style. Valerie thinks it's a triple sin if you enjoy it. Matt thinks he will see Ed in hell.
answers: Ed, Valerie, Chris, Lor, Atnee, Jessica, Matt are laughing at the sinfulness of the sex without marriage.

pred: Owen, Neil and Penny think Amy is acting strange. They haven't talked to her yet, but they should meet her in person.
answers: Amy has severe aura. Penny, Owen and Neil want to meet her in person.

answers: Emily's a guest at Linda's house. She broke one of Linda's green tea cups when she was cleaning the cupboards. Linda doesn't like them and she offers Emily the whole set.

pred: Steve bought a new Dream Theater album and Rob has it on his desk. They will share their opinions about the album later.
answers: Steve and Rob will talk about new Dream Theater album, after they finish listening.

pred: Erin has baked a cake and Zach wants a piece of it later. Zach is busy cleaning his flat.
answers: Erin has just baked something that Zachary finds delicious. Zachary wants her to bring him a piece of it as now he's busy cleaning.

pred: Wendy thinks the upstairs toilet might be blocked. David confirms it. Wendy didn't flush any tampons or pads down the toilet. They can't afford to call the plumber. They are out of money.
answers: The toilet upstairs is blocked again. Wendy and David can't afford the plumber as Wendy spent the money on her sister's birthday present.

pred: Tom wants to go to Dublin for the weekend.
answers: Camilla and Tom will go to Dublin this weekend.

pred: Kamden wants to see McKinley's photos on Facebook but McKinley is not a selfie person.
answers: Kamden hasn't used social media recently. He uses messenger only and wants to get Mckinley's photographs.

answers: Euodia didn't know about TikTok application, so Domigo explained what it was.

pred: Catherine applied for an accounting position at Pandora. She is going to have an interview on Monday. Jake gives her some tips for the interview and tells her to check the company's website for information.
answers: Catherine applied for an accounting position at Pandora. Jake has been working there for 5 years. This job offers a clear career path and benefits. Jake got promoted twice with salary increase. Catherine will have an interview on Monday.

answers: Iga and her boyfriend are not sitting together since Monday, because they had to cancel their weekend getaway. It made Iga very angry. Iga's boyfriend failed to convince a group to change the date of the presentation.

pred: Rachel and Wai are going to the museum at 4 pm. They might go to a bar after that. Rachel is worried that she won't be liked by the team. Wai assures her that they always welcome new people. They don't know what project they will be assigned to yet.

pred: Lorenna's daughter Emma has a fever and needs to stay home. She won't be able to attend the party.
answers: Lorenna is not coming to the party because her daughter is ill. She is going to see a doctor with her. Ann and Shirley send kisses to the kid.

pred: Agatha's presentation is about economics. She used recent research.
answers: Agatha is proud of herself because she has finished her presentation in Economics. She is very interested in Economics.

pred: Harry is outside waiting for Ema. Ema is late and apologizes.
answers: Harry waits outside. The movie has already started but Ema needs another 5 minutes, which made Harry angry.

pred: Julie and Emily are sending each other Christmas greetings.
answers: Emily and Julie wish Merry Christmas to each other.
